medical_history.chief_complaint: Near-fatal myocarditis after initiation of clozapine treatment.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began three days after clozapine initiation with flu-like symptoms including generalized body aches, nasal congestion, and a scratchy throat. Ten days later, following an increase in clozapine dosage, he exhibited fever, tachycardia, acute mental status change, lethargy, and disorientation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of schizoaffective disorder, bipolar type, with prior suicide attempts and two psychiatric hospitalizations. Notable medical history includes recurrent urinary tract infections and prostatitis.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal aunt and maternal grandfather with bipolar disorder; paternal grandfather institutionalized for unclear reasons; several family members with substance dependence.
medical_history.social_history: Unemployed, living with wife, with a history of alcohol and cocaine use in teenage and early adult years, but denied use in the years before admission.
